summary: The diff implements all four requirements (REQ-37 through REQ-40) with most acceptance criteria met. Key components are created: PromotionalAdsCarousel, PinVerificationModal, BalanceRevealCard, SpendingLimitsSummary, and ChallengesLeaderboardPreview. However, there is one notable gap: the REQ-40 acceptance criterion requiring a success toast when completing a challenge is not evidenced in the diff. Additionally, the ChallengesLeaderboardPreview shows challenge description rather than a title and lacks a dedicated progress indicator.

missing_requirements.requirement: Completing a challenge triggers the useCompleteChallenge mutation and shows a success toast
missing_requirements.reason: The ChallengesLeaderboardPreview.tsx calls completeChallenge(challenge.id) on button click, but there is no evidence of a toast notification being triggered on success in the visible portion of the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Active challenges should display a progress indicator
missing_requirements.reason: The challenge card in ChallengesLeaderboardPreview shows reward points (+X pts) but no progress indicator (e.g., progress bar or percentage) reflecting completion progress toward the challenge target amount.

hallucinated_features.description: PIN setup/onboarding flow within the modal when no PIN exists
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-38 only specifies validating against an already-stored PIN. A full PIN creation flow (isSettingUp state, confirmPin field, handleSetPin, PIN confirmation input) was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Show/hide PIN toggle using Eye/EyeOff icons in the PIN verification modal
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-38 specifies a masked 6-digit PIN input but does not request a show/hide toggle for revealing the PIN characters.
